caption: Such a great place with lots of other food options. I really liked the Paris Sandwich, which was on the freshest bread.  The macarons are delicious and full of flavor.  Such a wonderful addition to our neighborhood!

The macaroons are delicious along with the food. I ordered the Avocado toast with crabmeat for the first time, it was fresh and delicious. They do have some kinks to work out as a new business, but it is definitely worth a visit.

I tried a box of 5 assorted macarons. The Creme Brûlée, Wedding Almond, The Lemon tasted like it was a bit stale (like it had the taste of being in the fridge too long. Two others were not put in the box because I was told they were too hard. He put those boxes aside) and didn't really have a lemon flavor. I had high hopes for the Raspberry but the dough was dry and the jam a little too hard.  The boxes seemed to not be very well organized, nor labeled. It could be beneficial to organize them all by flavor from oldest to newest instead of picking them from different boxes. I'm sure that when they're fresh, they are amazing. Wishing them well on their growth; we need more shops like this around this area.

LYCHEE ROSE COMBO MACARONS!! They were so good. Just needed to let them warm a bit as we got them cold. The coffee was strong and amazing flavor. Cute place, has a lot of potential, excited to go back. Very friendly owner

The macarons were really good I loved them they were perfect. The chocolate flavor was weird though it was a completely different texture, like hard and crumbly with chocolate syrup in the middle. Not pleasant. And on the box it said wholesale macaroons which is weird cause I thought they made them themselves. Anyway I loved it mostly

Please do not order macarons from this place! Ours were stale, and reeked of mold!! The first time we ordered from them, way back in the spring or summer, the macarons tasted great. The texture of the meringue was perfect, and the filling have the macarons just enough moisture.  However, we ordered from them again today. Not only did they give us the wrong flavors, but the macarons reeked of mold and staleness! Two of the macarons were shaped and made the way macarons should be, but they were clearly very old and dehydrated. The rest of the macarons were abnormally large, and the “meringue” had more of an under-baked cake texture. The most worrisome part was that both the filling and meringue components smelled and tasted like a cold Eastern European basement.  We didn’t eat our macarons, but did gently taste (and spit out) each one to give the most honest review possible. These ones were BAD.  Please don’t order macarons here. There are many more businesses you can support that sell actual macarons. These will give you some pretty bad food poisoning.  EDIT IN RESPONSE  TO THE OWNER: First of all, we ordered off DoorDash but checked the address. We ordered from here. I have no idea how your recipe and process could be consistent given that two of our macarons were small, made of meringue with a slight crunch, and colored beautifully. While the other 8 were gigantic, soggy, and had a completely different texture + taste in the meringue. The only complaint we had about the two small ones were that they were super stale and dried out. They were clearly old. As a person who has WORKED IN A FRENCH BAKERY WITH REAL BAKERS FROM FRANCE, I can tell which macarons have subpar quality. Please at least have the dignity not to sell macarons that smell and taste of mold to your customers. FYI my partner ate more of the macarons than I did and actually got very sick. This is an update from after the review was posted.

This is one of the best place for macaroons. I remember the very first time I tried them from a bakery store in Queens it was the most disgusting macaroons I ever tried from that place that made me very skeptical about the taste and even trying it again, but once I found out that macaroons coffee bar sells them and found it was fresh and made by the owner and tried them and oh boy 😌 I fell in love 😻 with macaroons. I love the taste of it, the quality of it and the different flavors are *yummy* 😋 . Not only that their sandwiches and food are tasty and fresh ALWAYS. I always buy from here whenever I can. Been buying food from this place ever since they opened. I definitely RECOMMEND this place.  💛⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

the grilled chicken sandwich with pesto and mozz and this warm, crunchy bread is really, really hitting the spot. i will be coming back here, highly recommend! clean place, los of variety, tasty food and unique addition to this ocean hill neighborhood
Amazing experience and amazing food. Great service and the owner is wonderful. This cafe deserves also more attention.
Delicious breakfast food, fantastic macarons, and the staff is friendly and courteous. Absolutely the place to go for a quick sweet bite in Brooklyn!
I LOVE THIS CAFE. THE COFFEE WAS GOOD AND HOT. THE FOOD IS DELICIOUS, AND THE OWNER WELCOMED ME LIKE AN OLD FRIEND .  THIS IS A MUST STOP IN.!!!!!

When they first opened the  the dish i purchase was amazing.  I don't know what happened after that.  The first time I tried this dish ooh la la 👏 😋.  WHEN I went back to get the same dish it was so different.  Why change it if it was great the first time around. Everything about this meal was disgusting. I was frustrated and I wanted my money back.
Great tea, great macarons, and fabulous customer service!

I really enjoyed the hospitality of who I assume to be the owner. They were very welcoming and allowed my friend and I to sample their products, told us about upcoming menu plans, and made us a yummy coffee. Definitely recommend.

I visited here on a Saturday morning as they were just opening for the day. I was treated to excellent customer service and even better food. The spinach pie and avocado toast were delicious and the macaroons were delicious! Can’t wait to go back.
Their menu items are great and very unique there is something for everyone whether you love meat or you are vegetarian, good food and good coffee also this place is super clean
Cute cafe on Fulton, I passed by there a lot and always wondered what the name was. Finally stopped in and had some macarons. The raspberry and the chocolate hazelnut macarons are delicious!
